title: How to Change Instruments for a Midi File on Garageband

steps.headline: Put your midi file into GarageBand.
It will automatically separate the track into instruments that could be customized.
Go down to the bottom right.
steps.description: Press the button that has a circle around an "i".

text: Get your midi file.  Open GarageBand.  Put your midi file into GarageBand.  It will automatically separate the track into instruments that could be customized.  Select a track.  Go down to the bottom right. Press the button that has a circle around an "i". Select your instrument.  Play your track.
sentences: Put your midi file into GarageBand.
It will automatically separate the track into instruments that could be customized.
Go down to the bottom right.
Press the button that has a circle around an "i".
